data.name: Ghostly Moans
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1907630/Beauties_Academy__Spellcraft_Tournament/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1808040/On_my_own_A_Hot_Isekai_Adventure/


About the Game



The kingdom is almost fully healed from a deadly war and humans have been experiencing a peaceful era.

However, reports of spirits possession have been shocking some villagers and they have decided to ask for help in the Holy Temple.

Now, Mia, a young princess who is becoming well-known for her diplomatic way to exorcise these creatures, is the one who will find the ones responsible for the problem.

Features:


  • A Classic RPG Experience
  • Day and Night System
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Explore a Fantasy World
  • Side Quests

data.short_description: Spirits have been possessing people in the kingdom and a young priestess named Mia has become well-known for her diplomatic way to exorcise these creatures. Follow her in search of the ones responsible for this situation.
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
